item.title: Interesting Physics Links
item.description: I plan on collecting all the cool sites that I find, related to Physics of course, here. K. McDonald’s Physics Examples: A rich, old-internet site with myriad resources pertaining to physics. PSE: Book Recommendations: Physics StackExhange’s very own list of recommended books and resources. In The Dark: Cute Problems: A very nice little blog with some nice questions. Tong Lectures: The David Tong lecture notes. Wolfram ScienceWorld: A cool website with a lot of historical information.
